p:
Pathways analyses were performed in GSEA v4.0.3
14 with standard parameters, 1000 phenotype permutations and using KEGG pathways database as reference[ 15]. Additionally, gene ontology analyses were performed using the web-based GOrilla platform[ 16]. Multiple testing problems were addressed by employing Benjamini-Hochberg correction[ 17] and a q value below 0.05 was considered significant in all cases. All figures were made using ggplot2 v3.3.0
18 or VennDiagram v.1.6.20[ 19].
